about.intro:
Dear reader,

More than what we can do with words, this glossary uncovers what words can do with us. These words give form to the nuances from the unexplored nooks of everyday life—leaky sensations, feelings, in-between moments, and fleeting experiences that can be named but don’t seem to be.

We all carry textured experiences of time, yet our vocabulary for them remains sparse. There are gaping holes in the lexicon of time that we don’t even know we are missing. When these experiences remain unnamed, they remain unknown.
